item.title: Dellintosh :)
item.description: Last day I managed to install Mac OS X Snaow Leopard 10.6 from the original retail DVD on my Dell Inspiron 1525. And to my astonishment it was pretty easy! - even though it took me 3 trials to get the hang of it :) After that I also updated it to SL version 10.6.5 :D I followed the excellent guideÂ available here. Take a print out of this guide and then do as follows:
